title: Calvin & Hobbes
content:
Calvin: You can’t just turn on creativity like a faucet. You have to be in the right mood.

Hobbes: What mood is that?

Calvin: Last-minute panic.

title: Andr√©s Segovia
content: It is not so hard to be original, what is hard, is to be original with continuity.

title: Chad McMillan
content: Designing something is like having a baby. Asking me to try another design once I’ve birthed something amazing is like asking me to put the baby back in the womb and try again. That never works out for anyone.
